frontmatter.name: swCornerTreatmentTrimType_e
frontmatter.description: Structure system corner treatment trim types.

title: swCornerTreatmentTrimType_e
description: Structure system corner treatment trim types.

values.description: = Conforms the intersecting member to the shape of adjacent faces by adding or removing material according to trim order
= Trims the members at a 45 degree angle; valid only for two member corner treatments
= Cuts the intersecting member with a plane using first contact or full contact trim
